@ nostradamek

There are 4 subtitles in the movie (muxed in the container) and they are OPTIONAL. You can switch to the subtitle you like or completely disable them. I provide detailed info in the torrent description :-)

VLC Player: Video-->Subtitles Track-->Disable

Cheers :-)
